description:
With Port Biliora freed, it`s time for our three heroes to begin their overland journey to Dragonia. But as they bid farewell to Captain Schiff and The Lanche, Captain Yut suddenly shows up with Co Uta Mara and a terrifying superweapon!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Co Uta Mara Strikes Back Big-Time!
コ・ウタ・マーラの大逆襲!
